title: test create product with image upload
description: Verify that a product can be created successfully with all required fields and an image uploaded, ensuring the image is stored and linked correctly.

title: test read product details
description: Verify that product details can be retrieved correctly by product ID, including all product information and associated image data.

title: test update product information and image
description: Verify that product information and its image can be updated successfully, and changes are reflected in the database.

title: test delete product and associated image
description: Verify that a product can be deleted successfully and that the associated image is also removed from storage.

title: test create order with valid data
description: Verify that an order can be created successfully with valid customer and product data, and the order is stored correctly in the database.

title: test retrieve order details
description: Verify that order details can be retrieved correctly by order ID, including customer information and ordered products.

title: test update order status
description: Verify that the status of an existing order can be updated successfully and the update is reflected in the database.

title: test product api response time
description: Verify that the Product API endpoints respond within acceptable time frames under normal load conditions.

title: test order api response time
description: Verify that the Order API endpoints respond within acceptable time frames under normal load conditions.

title: test error handling for invalid product requests
description: Verify that the Product API handles invalid requests gracefully, returning appropriate error messages and status codes.
